text.p: COAL - Cape Australia - 140,000 tonnes coal Hay Point/Rotterdam plus Hansaport $9.55 fio 50,000/20,000 shinc BHP.
Esplanade - 120,000 tonnes coal Hampton Roads/Ijmuiden mid Seeptember $5.35 level six days shinc Hoogovens.
ORE - Folegandros - 125,000 tonnes ore Tuburao/Rotterda 10-20/9 $5.50 fio six days shinc Rohstoffhandel.
Fixtures reported from New York on Wednesday.
COAL - Docecape 110,000/10 tonnes coal Baltimore/Money Point 15-30/9 $5.70 four days/25,000 shinc Cetragpa.
TBN 60,000/10 tonnes coal no range op USG/Jorf Lasfar Nov-Apr $6.90 op $7.75 30,000/12,000 shinc eight-ten cargoes Glencore.
Ocean Cherry 55,000/10 tonnes petroleum coke Long Beach/AntRottAmsterdam 1-10/9 $9.25 five days shinc Koch.
TBN 65,000/10 tonnes coal Hay Point/Oxelosund and Lulea 12-27/9 $12.00 35,000 shinc/10,000 shex BHP.
ORE - TBN 110,000/10 tonnes iron ore Tubarao/Kaohsiung 5-15/10 $9.20 40,000/38,000 CSC.
